item.title: Jekyll + Rouge 소스코드 하일라이팅 테스트
item.description: Rouge 이거 적용해보기. https://github.com/ageldama/hello-adder-cl-asdf/blob/master/src/adders.lisp ;;; Actual Implementations here. (in-package :hello-adder) (defun make-adder (n) (lambda (x) (+ n x))) (defun 1+er () (make-adder 1)) https://github.com/ageldama/ageldama-gh-jekyll/commit/334ead4b31b305b82e85ae2c6a6e0a219ecc9e66 이렇게 작업해봤음.
